title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of
heading: In these Regulations, “Principal Act” means the Asset Covered Securities
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations, “Principal Act” means the Asset Covered Securities 

Act 2001 (No. 47 of 2001). 

Amendment of section 3 of Principal Act
text_norm: 2 regulation principal act mean asset covered security act 2001 (no 47 2001) amendment section 3 principal act

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of
heading: 3. Section 3 of the Principal Act is amended, in subsection (1), by the
text_raw:
3. Section 3 of the Principal Act is amended, in subsection (1), by the 
substitution of the following definition for the definition of “public sector 
entities”: 

“ ‘public sector entities’ has the same meaning as it has in point (8) of Article 
4(1) of Regulation (EU) No 575/2013;”. 

Amendment of section 5 of Principal Act
text_norm: 3 section 3 principal act amended subsection (1) substitution following definition definition public sector entity public sector entity meaning point (8) article 4(1) regulation (eu) 575 2013  amendment section 5 principal act

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of
heading: 4. Section 5 of the Principal Act is amended, in subsection (1), by the
text_raw:
4. Section 5 of the Principal Act is amended, in subsection (1), by the 

substitution of the following paragraph for paragraph (d): 

“(d) (i) 

a multilateral development bank referred to in Article 117 
of Regulation (EU) No 575/2013, or 

(ii) 

an international organisation referred to in Article 118 of 
Regulation (EU) No 575/2013,”. 

1 OJ No. L. 176, 27.06.2013. p.1. 
2 OJ No. L. 204, 26.6.2020, p. 4. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 28th September, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [485] 3 

Amendment of section 6 of Principal Act

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of
heading: 5. Section 6 of the Principal Act is amended by the substitution of the
text_raw:
5. Section 6 of the Principal Act is amended by the substitution of the 

following subsection for subsection (4): 

“(4) Property referred to in subsection (3)(a) shall be an exposure to an 
institution (within the meaning of point (3) of Article 4(1) of Regulation (EU) 
No 575/2013).”. 

Amendment of section 32 of Principal Act
text_norm: 5 section 6 principal act amended substitution following subsection subsection (4) (4) property referred subsection (3)(a) shall exposure institution (within meaning point (3) article 4(1) regulation (eu) 575 2013)  amendment section 32 principal act

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of
heading: 6. Section 32 of the Principal Act is amended, in subsection (12), by the
text_raw:
6. Section 32 of the Principal Act is amended, in subsection (12), by the 
substitution of “after having regard to the valuation requirements applicable to 
covered bonds under Regulation (EU) No 575/2013” for “after having regard to 
the valuation requirements applicable to covered bonds under the Codified 
Banking Directive”. 

Amendment of section 35 of Principal Act
text_norm: 6 section 32 principal act amended subsection (12) substitution regard valuation requirement applicable covered bond regulation (eu) 575 2013 regard valuation requirement applicable covered bond codified banking directive  amendment section 35 principal act

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of
heading: 7. Section 35 of the Principal Act is amended, in subsection (9B), by the
text_raw:
7. Section 35 of the Principal Act is amended, in subsection (9B), by the 

substitution of the following paragraph for paragraph (a): 

“(a) shall have regard to creditworthiness standards or criteria 
applicable to substitution assets as eligible collateral for covered 
bonds under Regulation (EU) No 575/2013, and”. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal, 

24 September, 2021. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [485]
